meanings.definition: An antifungal medication used to treat fungal infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed nystatin to cure the fungal infection on my skin.
meanings.sent2: Nystatin is commonly used to treat yeast infections in the mouth.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke that nystatin walks into a bar and all the fungi start running away!
meanings.sent4: Her skin cleared up like magic after using nystatin, it was like waving a wand.
meanings.sent5: The nystatin worked like a superhero, fighting off the fungal villains in my body.

meanings.definition: A substance that is effective against fungi.
meanings.sent1: The cleaning solution contained nystatin to kill the fungi on the bathroom tiles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching new forms of nystatin to combat drug-resistant fungi.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners sprinkled nystatin on the soil, hoping to scare away the pesky fungi.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like nystatin, unwavering and powerful against any obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The nystatin acted like a shield, protecting the plants from the harmful fungi.
